sql.sql:
select 
    :request xxx,
    t.ID "id",
    t.ID_HI "parentId",
    t.GROUPFL "isGroup",
    t.NLEVEL,
    t.MARK "mark",
    t.MODEL "model",
    substr(t.MARK||' '||t.MODEL,1,250) "name"
from L_AUTOMODEL t
where json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.id.filter') is null
  and :parentId is null and t.id_hi is null
   or json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.id.filter') is null
  and :parentId is not null and t.id_hi=:parentId
   or json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.id.filter') is not null 
  and upper(substr(t.MARK||' '||t.MODEL,1,250)) like '%%'||upper(json_value(:request, '$.filterModel.id.filter'))||'%%'
  and t.groupfl=0
order by MARK, MODEL
